column4: Hi.  12.10 64bit fresh install.  I have an nvidia GeForce 7950GT that won't work properly with 12.10 64bit.  It works in 32bit though.  No matter if I use recommended or latest nvndia drivers.  The symptoms are lo-res colour(like 16bit) and a larger desktop than the montior allows..I checked overscan properties and it is greyed out under nvidia settings...any help appreciated
i might have to hit the forums or stack overflow
It sounds like in 32 bit mode it's using the right driver but using the vesa driver in 64 bit mode
ok.  ill have to check the forums to see if others have this issue
